text:
Ira & Terri have a beautiful home, in an older, well established, beautiful neighborhood in Austin.  Our entrance was private, with a key code lock on our door.

Unique & wonderful restaurants are within walking distance (we went to two of them & were very pleased!)  

The room we stayed in has been beautifully renovated and exceptionally well appointed.  Bath towels, bed linens & room appointments 5 star!  Our room included a mini fridge & sink with a wonderful coffee machine.
title: Mid-Century Modern 1BD+ Apartment
